Kim

Group (2024-present):
VVUP

Introduction

Kim is an Indonesian singer and actress under EgoENT. She is a member of the girl group VVUP. She was a contestant on The Voice Kids Indonesia (2016) and The Indonesian Next Big Star (2022). She made her solo debut on February 22, 2019, with the single "Shine (ft. ELS & Willy Winarko)" under the stage name KIM!.
